title: The Wingman Chronicles
description: James Holeva, aka "The Wingman," is as classy as he is crass. His lifeis a dirty ride of uncouth adventures involving weddings, proms,threesomes, soccer moms, models, strippers, balconies, bedrooms,backseats and bathroom stalls. No details are spared in this humorous,erotic, autobiographical novel depicting all of his hedonisticdebauchery. Full of jaw-dropping moments, gut-busting laughs andmultiple orgasms, "The Wingman Chronicles" will make you laugh andorgasm at the same time.
author: James Holeva
